mapper.sql: id, title, content, category_id, child_category_id, attach_url, to_document, tags, publish_time, enable, create_time, create_user_id, modify_time, modify_user_id
mapper.select:
select
distinct
'false' as QUERYID,
from express
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into express (id, title, content, category_id, child_category_id, attach_url, to_document, tags, publish_time, enable, create_time, create_user_id, modify_time, modify_user_id) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{categoryId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{childCategoryId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{attachUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{toDocument,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{tags,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{publishTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{enable,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createUserId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{modifyUserId,jdbcType=INTEGER})

mapper.update:
update express
title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
content = #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
category_id = #{categoryId,jdbcType=INTEGER},

where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
